keyword: how many calories are in a coors light
title: How Many Calories Are in a Coors Light?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a Coors Light, including carbs, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown for a standard 12 oz serving.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Coors Light?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle or can of Coors Light lager beer, chilled, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and temperature; check labels for exact values from the manufacturer.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz Coors Light has 102 calories and 5 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add a splash of lime juice (1 tsp per bottle)
Coors Light vs regular Coors (higher carb version)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Coors Light bottle?
faqs.a: About 102 calories in a standard 12 oz Coors Light.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Coors Light?
faqs.a: 5 g total carbs per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does Coors Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Coors Light?
Is Coors Light low calorie compared to other beers?
faqs.a: Yes, at 102 kcal, it's lower than many regular beers (e.g., 150+ kcal).
